en_title: Secretary for Justice to visit Seoul

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, has been invited to visit Seoul, Korea from November 10 to 12 to attend an international conference on international arbitration.

Mr Yuen will deliver a speech to promote Hong Kong's legal and dispute resolution services at the opening ceremony of the conference, which is jointly organised by the United Nations Commission on International Trade Law Regional Centre for Asia and the Pacific, the Ministry of Justice of the Republic of Korea, and the Korean Commercial Arbitration Board.
Mr Yuen will visit the Seoul International Dispute Resolution Centre and the Korean Bar Association to further enhance exchanges with Korea's legal sector.
Mr Yuen will return to Hong Kong on the afternoon of November 12.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師將於十一月十日至十二日期間應邀訪問韓國首爾，出席一個有關國際仲裁服務的國際會議。
該會議由聯合國國際貿易法委員會亞洲及太平洋區域中心、韓國法務部及韓國商事仲裁院聯合主辦。袁國強將於該會議的開幕儀式上致辭，推廣香港的法律和解決爭議服務。
袁國強亦會到訪首爾國際爭議解決中心和大韓辯護士協會，進一步加強與韓國法律界的交流。
袁國強將於十一月十二日下午返港。
